articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Guinea
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Monday sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, on the 59th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably in the future, too, Kim Yong Nam wished the Guinean president excellent successes in his work for achieving national unity and building peaceful and prosperous Guinea.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Farm No. 1116 Run by KPA Unit 810
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Farm No. 1116 Run by KPA Unit 810
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Senior party officials in the capital and local areas visited Farm No. 1116 under Unit 810 of the Korean People's Army.
					 Senior officials of the C.C., WPK and chairmen of the provincial, city and county committees of the WPK went round the farm.
					
					 The visitors laid bouquets before the monument to the field guidance of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Being briefed on the immortal leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men associated with the farm at the room dedicated to education in their revolutionary history, they looked back upon the patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They went round several places of the farm along the course covered by the respected Supreme Leader during his field guidance.
					
					 They toured the research institute built as a base for ultra-modern agricultural scientific research and experimental and cultivated plots, etc.
					
					 They also watched high-yield strains of crops bred by the scientists and technicians of the farm.
					
					 The visitors expressed their will to implement the Party's policy for seed improvement to the letter in the agricultural sector and thus bring about a radical turn in the work for solving food problem.

articles.title: Foundation Day of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea took place in front of the Mausoleum of King Tangun on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Chairman of the National Reconciliation Council Kim Yong Dae who is chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Ri Kil Song and Kim Wan Su, presidium members of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, officials of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang and overseas compatriots.
					
					 They performed an ancestral sacrifice for Tangun.
					
					 Then Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, made a commemorative report.
					
					 He said that the pain and misfortune of division imposed by foreign forces are unbearable and unpardonable any longer, adding that all the fellow countrymen should open up a broad avenue to the independent reunification by giving full play to the nation's enormous strength and unshakable will for reunification.
					
					 He stressed the need to vigorously struggle for the final victory in the building of a powerful socialist country and the anti-U.S. confrontation, united as one in mind around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the sun of the nation and the loadstar of national reunification.

articles.title: National Seminar Held
articles.content:
National Seminar Held
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to deeply grasp the immortal feats of leader Kim Jong Il for party building and strengthen the Workers' Party of Korea into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party forever.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and officials of party and administrative bodies and working people's organizations, armed forces organs and science, education, literature and arts, media and party cadre training institutions and the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants heard papers.
					
					 The floor of the seminar was taken by Kim Ki Nam, Ri Yong Chol, director-general and editor-in-chief of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House, Cha Kyong Il, president of Kim Il Sung Political University, Myong Son Yong, principal of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, and Sin Yong Chol, director of the Political Bureau of the Cabinet.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was a great auspicious and historic event as it made it possible to steadily develop the WPK into the party of the leader and the revolutionary party of Juche type and advance straight its cause along the invariable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 They referred to the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed with his rare ideo-theoretical wisdom and tested leadership to strengthen the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type in which the monolithic idea and guidance of the leader are strictly ensured.
					
					 His greatest feat for the revolutionary cause of Juche is that he saw to it that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was held at the top post of the WPK to open up a bright future of the socialist cause of Juche, they said in unison.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il's feats for building the revolutionary party of the leader have been creditably preserved by Kim Jong Un, the speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il would be always alive as the eternal general secretary of the WPK, the symbol of invincibility and the Sun of Songun as he had strengthened the WPK into the powerful political staff for the Songun revolution under the uplifted banner of Songun all his life, thus fully displaying its dignity and might to the world.
					
					 They underlined the need to get rallied as one in mind around the WPK Central Committee and fully demonstrate the invincible might of the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and make all-out charge for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the bright blueprint for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist country unfolded by the 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: National Symposium on Greenhouse Vegetable, Legume and Grass Seed Production
articles.content:
National Symposium on Greenhouse Vegetable, Legume and Grass Seed Production
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on greenhouse vegetable, legume and grass seed production in the DPRK took place at the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute under the Institute of Agricultural Science on Monday and Tuesday. 
					 Present there were officials and researchers of the Institute of Agricultural Science, ministries, national institutions and science research, educational and relevant fields.
					
					 Attending it were also members of missions of the European Union Programme Support and the UN Food and Agriculture Organization.
					
					 Speakers at the symposium stressed the importance of seed in radically increasing production of greenhouse vegetable, legume and grass production conducive to improving people's diet and public health.
					
					 The symposium dealt with scientific problems arising in researches into seeds and application of their results.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Meet to Support Peace and Reunification of Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Meet to Support Peace and Reunification of Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans held a meeting in Moscow on Sept. 30 to support the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were representatives of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the General Association of Koreans in China, the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., the Federation of Koreans in Canada, the European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the United Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan, the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan and other organizations of overseas Koreans in different countries and Koreans in Russia.
					
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Ambassador to Russia Kim Hyong Jun, experts of Korean affairs of the Institute of Oriental Studies and the Institute of the Far East under the Russian Academy of Sciences, members of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association and Russians.
					
					 Introduced at the meeting were congratulatory messages and letters of solidarity. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador made a congratulatory address.
					
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, made a keynote report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the historic October 4 declaration is the immortal great programme to hasten Korea's reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, as it is the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 To respect and sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed by the north and the south is the only most realistic way of achieving peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, they said. 
					
					 The appeal to all overseas Koreans and world peace-loving people was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 An art performance and a reception were given on the same day.

articles.title: Japan-DPRK Friendship Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japan-DPRK Friendship Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A Japan-DPRK friendship delegation from Kyusu of Japan headed by Mamoru Kitahara, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Hyogo Prefectural People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship led by Secretary General Hiromi Miyamoto arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Newly-Built Vehicle Ferry Appears in Taedong River
articles.content:
Newly-Built Vehicle Ferry Appears in Taedong River
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Harbor Transportation Bureau under the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport of the DPRK recently built a 320-ton vehicle ferry and launched it in the Taedong River.
					 The ferry capable of carrying several trucks plies between Sonchang-dong of Waudo District, Nampho City and Jedo-ri of Unchon County, South Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: Home-visiting Group of Korean Students in Japan Departs
articles.content:
Home-visiting Group of Korean Students in Japan Departs
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students of the Korean University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Jo Yong Rae left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy to U.S.
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy to U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities lost their temper and running riot, stunned by the thunderbolt-like declaration of Juche Korea against the empire of evils making the world restless.
					 No sooner had the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea been reported than the south Korean chief executive let his inferiors term it "provocation antagonizing a foreign country" and "threatening language escalating tensions."
					
					 Such behavior of the south Korean authorities enraged and disillusioned all Koreans like the hysteria of Trump, an old gangster of America who unhesitatingly cried out for totally destroying the DPRK.
					
					 Just after he returned from the U.S., the chief executive of south Korea chaired a "meeting of security council" to map out a "plan for deterring the north's additional provocation", saying that "there is no other option left but for the international community to pressurize the north in the same tone."
					
					 Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa often repeated her rubbish calling for "dealing a heavy blow to the north" through the implementation of the "sanctions resolution" to make "the north's regime change its path" during the recent UN General Assembly session.
					
					 The puppet regime got its U.S. master's agreement to fly B-1B in the sky above the Korean peninsula twice a month. It has buckled down to pushing ahead with the rotation deployment of U.S. nuclear strategic equipment and purchase of ultra-modern weapons and equipment.
					
					 Such ill moves shed light on the true colors and nature of the puppet authorities as faithful dogs of the U.S. and stooges for executing its war that betrayed not only the candlelight demonstrators of south Korea but also all other Koreans.
					
					 The puppet regime's sycophancy to the U.S. is just an act of treachery that aggravates the north-south confrontation and escalates the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and a stupid act of precipitating its self-destruction.
					
					 The traitors of the regime are hurting the compatriots while prioritizing the outsiders, not the nation, and blindly currying favor with the U.S. It is preposterous for them to talk about dialogue and repair of the north-south relations. It is just paradox deceiving the public at home and abroad.
					
					 Any evil act deserves punishment.
					
					 The fate of the faithful dogs of the U.S. has already been sealed.
					
					 The puppet regime will have to pay dearly for persistently following the U.S. in its hostile moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: Nothing Can Stop Juche Korea from Advancing: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Nothing Can Stop Juche Korea from Advancing: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The world is hardly repressing admiration at the DPRK dynamically advancing despite the unprecedentedly harsh sanctions and pressure.
					 Oleg Ivanov, chief of the Center for Social Disputes Studies of Russia, in an article posted on an internet newspaper said the sanctions on the DPRK have resulted in adverse effects, noting that the DPRK has increased the capabilities for self-defence to cope with the U.S. moves for isolating and stifling it. It stressed that stronger sanctions prompted the Korean people to get rallied closer around their leadership, adding sanctions can never isolate the DPRK.
					
					 Western media and experts of different research institutes claim that the "north Korean regime does not mind international sanctions", "What is surprising is the north Koreans' love and enthusiasm about their regime" and that "sanctions on the DPRK can never prove effective". This is deserved estimation.
					
					 Now the U.S. and other hostile forces are waiting for the DPRK to yield while kicking up the harshest sanctions racket to stamp out the sovereignty and the right to existence of the DPRK.
					
					 This is just a foolish dream of those ignorant of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is a dignified political and ideological power, a worldwide military power and a responsible nuclear weapons state that has grown stronger with the might of single-minded unity and self-development.
					
					 Despite the centuries-old hideous sanctions and pressure, the army and people of the DPRK have proved in practice the noble truth that the single-minded unity represents the lifeline of Juche Korea, constitutes the source of its surge and that the only way to be taken by it is self-development.
					
					 As was recognized by the world, the DPRK has achieved everything now in its hand at the cost of blood and sweat despite the ceaseless nuclear threat and sanctions imposed by the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces for decades.
					
					 Trust in the party, faith in socialism and confidence of the final victory have taken deep roots into the minds of the Korean people in the course of overcoming manifold difficulties following the party.
					
					 We are not scared by any sanctions and will certainly foil sanctions and blockade with the sledge-hammer of self-reliance and hooves of Mallima and bring about a final victory. This is the answer of the Korean people.
					
					 Whatever forms of sanctions and blockade the enemies may impose on the DPRK, they can never browbeat the Korean people as long as the powerful state nuclear force firmly guarantees the security of the country and the people and there are the most advantageous socialist system and the solid self-reliant foundation of national economy.
					
					 Nothing can check the advance of Juche Korea, a country which legitimately ranked itself among nuclear powers with dignity despite the half a century-long siege by the imperialists.

articles.title: U.S. Is Arch Criminal Who Brings Danger of Nuclear War on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Arch Criminal Who Brings Danger of Nuclear War on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An extreme apprehension and fear is prevailing in south Korea the root cause of which is none other than the U.S., says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 As well known, the Trump group set forth such ferocious policy toward the DPRK as "maximum pressure and engagement" with an extreme ambition to disarm and do harm to the DPRK under the pretext of the "nuclear disarmament" and has resorted to unprecedented sanctions and military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. frenzy to stifle the DPRK led the latter to build up nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Far from drawing lesson in the failure of the hostile policy, the U.S. imperialists bereft of reason are trying to stifle the DPRK by force of arms after setting forth "military counteraction proposal".
					
					 No one can vouch what kind of adventure Trump clan will resort to as it has been engaged in nuclear threat and blackmail only to dig its own graveyard.
					
					 If a nuclear war breaks out on the Korean peninsula which is not large, south Korea would suffer huge loss.
					
					 The prevailing warphobia in south Korea is an inevitable product of the present puppet rulers' blind servile to the U.S. adventurous moves to provoke a nuclear war against the north. It is also ascribable to the conservatives' reckless confrontational racket.
					
					 The present grave situation of the peninsula clearly proves that the south Korean people can never get rid of the danger of war, if the U.S. keen on nuclear war moves against the north and the traitors zealously following it are allowed to go at large.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Rabid Dogs of American Breed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Rabid Dogs of American Breed
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet authorities slammed the speech of the foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea at the UN General Assembly denouncing the U.S. war maniac Trump.
					 Those of the Minju Party in south Korea asserted that the DPRK "blackmailed the international community" and "threatened peace", even urging it to make an "apology". The conservative opposition parties including the "Liberal Korea Party" recklessly spat out invectives against the DPRK foreign minister's remarks on the validity of access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence, calling them "stubbornness and far-fetched charge" and "height of shamelessness just like a guilty party filing the suit first".
					
					 This is the admission that they were fools failing to see objective reality obsessed with pro-U.S. sycophancy, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 When the army and people of the DPRK enraged at the violent remarks of Trump turn out as one in the standoff with the U.S., the worthless south Korean authorities are running amuck in confrontation, which reminds one of the devil's martyr which perishes in needless danger.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities dance to the tune of war played by Trump as now, they would face the miserable fate of suffering nuclear disaster together with their master.
					
					 We will surely settle accounts with not only the warmongers like Trump but also rabid dogs of American breed resorting to treachery in the political camp of south Korea.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules UNSC, Marionette of U.S.
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules UNSC, Marionette of U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Trump at the recent United Nations General Assembly blared that he would totally destroy the DPRK, a full-fledged UN member state and a sovereign state.
					 But, the UN Security Council has not put into question his reckless utterance.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday says this is attributable to the fact that the UNSC turned into a marionette of the U.S. and a political tool for the U.S. world supremacy.
					
					 The UNSC has already lost the ability to discern right from wrong and justice from injustice and the will for fair and aboveboard solution of international issues, it says, adding:
					
					 If the UNSC is an international organization which maintains its independence with its own political viewpoint, it would never keep mum about the war crimes of the U.S. that has aggravated the situation on the Korean peninsula through large-scale joint military exercises for aggression and threatened global peace and security. And it wouldn't have adopted the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions," which are contrary to the UN Charter and disregard the righteous right of a sovereign state to self-defence.
					
					 Since UNSC okays all the requirements of the U.S., Trump, an old war maniac and gangster, is going on the rampage with powder-reeking remarks even in the sacred UN arena.
					
					 The misbehavior of UNSC playing to the tune of the U.S. will result in undermining its confidence before humankind, which will lead to the end of UNSC's existence.
					
					 The wrong behaviors of UNSC, a theatre of double standards deprived of justice, truth and impartiality, make us think over what path is to safeguard the sovereignty and dignity of the country and security of the people.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Regime's Attempt to Make Evil Laws
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Regime's Attempt to Make Evil Laws
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese regime is desperately pushing ahead with the institution of law on punishment of organized crimes despite the strong public protest.
					 Minju Joson's Tuesday commentary terms this a bid to materialize the wild militarist ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Militarist overseas expansion is the primary policy goal of the present Japanese regime.
					
					 The regime has worked hard to carry it out but there still remain many problems.
					
					 It should modify the present constitution banning it from participating in a war and having a regular army, and lay a material foundation for emerging as a military giant.
					
					 The regime, out of its calculation that to put under control the opposition political forces is indispensable for removing such political and military obstacles, is seeking to draw up evil laws for reviving militarism and thus attain its ill-intended political goals with ease.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to cook up the evil law to eliminate the opposition political forces as the anti-government sentiments grow stronger day by day among the public against their desperate moves for reviving militarism.
					
					 But such an evil deed will only boomerang on them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blames S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Their Pro-U.S. Acts
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blames S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Their Pro-U.S. Acts
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive who participated in the UN General Assembly shortly ago cowardly went to see his U.S. and Japanese masters, saying that he "highly appreciated" Trump's remarks and "they will prove very effective". What should not be overlooked is that as soon as the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK was announced, he made coteries of the ministry of Unification and the foreign ministry dare to challenge it with such reckless remarks that "it is a provocation to other country and threatening rhetoric escalating tension". He discussed the "plan for deterring the north's additional provocation" at a security council meeting on September 24.
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday denounces their deeds as another anti-national crime that can never be tolerated as they are a hideous provocation hurting the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are colonial stooges in every aspect as they patronized Trump's insane remarks and slandered the DPRK's stand for toughest counteraction, it says, and goes on:
					
					 Such behaviors fully revealed once again the true colors of the present south Korean regime as a miserable pro-U.S. stooge who can not live without dependence on its U.S. master. And they clearly proved that the south Korean chief executive's assertion that "disaster of war should not be repeated on this land" was a deceptive advertisement to cover up his true nature as a pro-American traitor keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen and mislead the public.
					
					 The puppet authorities' deeds servile to the U.S. are a crime of further heightening the tension in the Korean Peninsula and the region by inciting the U.S. war moves against the DPRK and a foolish act of precipitating their own destruction.

articles.title: Nothing Can Check Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Nothing Can Check Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Trump recently signed an executive order indiscriminately applying sanctions on all individuals and organizations doing trade and financial dealings with the DPRK. Accordingly, the U.S. Department of Treasury additionally included banks of the DPRK and relevant officials in the sanctions list. In the meantime, the House of Representatives of the U.S. passed "north Korean human rights reauthorization act" in order to undermine the DPRK from inside.
					 Timed to coincide with this, the U.S. military sent two B-1B strategic bombers and six F-15C fighters to the sky above the open sea in the East Sea of Korea to commit a military provocation threatening the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Tuesday brands this as a product of stop-gap measure taken by the mentally deranged to save their face which has been put in disgrace in the face of the high spirit of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Terming the hysteric acts of Trump and his group as a suicidal act of digging deeper their own grave, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is making senseless remarks, being lost to reason and is opting for military challenge. This is just a last-ditch effort to get rid of extreme uneasiness over the DPRK's state nuclear force that has been bolstered in the final stage of completion and avoid the shuddering horror over the toughest countermeasure unprecedented in history now under serious consideration by the headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 Whatever means the Trump group may use, they can never undermine the tremendous overall state might of the DPRK and its strategic position nor check the DPRK making dynamic advance in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: S. Korea: Regime Accused of Disregarding Evils
articles.content:
S. Korea: Regime Accused of Disregarding Evils
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions, the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and other various organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 29 to protest the puppet government avoiding the work for abolishing evils, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Additional deployment of THAAD did not make the Korean peninsula safe but more dangerous and arms introduction is increasing, the speakers stated.
					
					 They urged the regime to probe the truth behind the Ferry Sewol disaster, punish those responsible for the death of Paek Nam Gi and ensure rights to trade unions.
					
					 Although Park Geun Hye was ousted and the "president" was changed, the society remains unchanged, they said, adding they keenly understood that the present "government" is no better than the Park Geun Hye regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The  group of courageous youths in south Korea reportedly launched a protest action outside the Defense Ministry to denounce the south Korean puppet military authorities for hastening the preparations of war against the north on Sept. 29.
					 The group charged that the puppet defense minister cried out for "foundation of unit for beheading operation" and "introduction of nuclear submarine", begging the U.S. for nuclear weapons.
					
					 His behavior is little different from crimes committed by the five traitors in 1905, it stressed.
					
					 Noting that many civilians were killed in the wars ignited by the U.S., the group warned that if the defense minister continues to incite war, disregarding the public mindset, the protest action will go on.

articles.title: Significant Anniversaries of DPRK Observed in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Austrian Website
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its website respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the WPK is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also says that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is invincible.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee was formed on Sept. 26 to celebrate the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize meeting, film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion.

articles.title: Funcionarios partidistas de centro y localidades visitan la Granja No. 1116
articles.content:
Funcionarios partidistas de centro y localidades visitan la Granja No. 1116 
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del Comite Central y los presidentes de los comites del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en diferentes provincias, ciudades y distritos visitaron el dia 3 la Granja No. 1116 adscrita a la Unidad 810 del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Ante todo, los visitantes depositaron los ramos de flores ante el monumento a las visitas de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Escuchando, en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, las explicaciones sobre las inmortales hazanas de orientacion de los grandes hombres, recordaron el patriotismo y la abnegacion del Dirigente y el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Recorrieron varios puntos de la granja siguiendo la ruta de direccion en el terreno del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Pasaron revista al instituto construido como base de investigacion de ciencias agricolas de punta, las parcelas de ensayo y cultivo de plantas agricolas, etc.
					
					Ellos vieron las plantas de buena variedad desarrolladas por los cientificos y tecnicos de la granja.
					
					Los visitantes expresaron la decision de materializar cabalmente la orientacion del partido sobre el mejoramiento de semillas en el frente agricola con vistas a registrar un cambio decisivo en la solucion del problema de alimentos del pueblo.

articles.title: Seminario central para fortalecer el PTC como Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista
articles.content:
Seminario central para fortalecer el PTC como Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario central para estudiar profundamente las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas por la construccion del partido y fortalecer y desarrollar el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como organizacion Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, y los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, administracion, entidades de masas, instituciones de fuerzas armadas, ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, formacion de cuadros del partido y del sector de preservacion de reliquias de interes historico-revolucionario en el centro y la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  Fueron publicadas las tesis.
					
					  Intervinieron en el foro Kim Ki Nam, Ri Yong Chol, director general y editor en jefe de la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Cha Kyong Il, presidente de la Universidad Politica Kim Il Sung, Myong Son Yong, director de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, y Sin Yong Chol, jefe del Buro Politico del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					  Los oradores comentaron que la eleccion del Dirigente como Secretario General del PTC fue un evento jubiloso que hizo posible fortalecer y desarrollar sin cesar el PTC como el partido del lider y el revolucionario del tipo jucheano y un acontecimiento historico que permitio impulsar firmemente la causa del partido por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.
					
					  Senalaron que el Dirigente logro la inmortal proeza revolucionaria en fortalecer y desarrollar el PTC con su clarividencia ideo-teorica y direccion probada como partido del lider y el revolucionario del tipo Juche que mantiene con firmeza la unicidad de idea y direccion del lider.
					
					  Elogiaron que su mayor hazana realizada por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche es haber enaltecido al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un al cargo cimero del PTC y abierto el futuro prometedor de la causa socialista.
					
					  Dijeron que las hazanas del Dirigente se defienden y continuan con exito gracias al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					  Indicaron que sera inmortal como eterno Secretario General del PTC, simbolo de invencibilidad y Sol del Songun, el Dirigente quien demostro a todo el mundo la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso del partido al fortalecerlo como poderoso Estado Mayor politico de la revolucion del Songun bajo la bandera del Songun. 
					
					Por ultimo, llamaron a la ofensiva general para acoger la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, segun el maravilloso proyecto de construccion de la potencia socialista presentado por el VII Congreso del PTC, demostrando plenamente el poderio invencible del Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista con la unidad monolitica en torno al CC del PTC.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por Dia de Fundacion de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por Dia de Fundacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 ante el Mausoleo de Tangun (fundador de Corea) el acto por el Dia de la Fundacion de Corea.
					    En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y director del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional, Ri Kil Song y Kim Wan Su, miembros de la presidencia del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, los funcionarios del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun y de la rama interesada, los trabajadores capitalinos y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					  Ante todo, tuvo lugar la ceremonia en recordacion de Tangun.
					
					  El vicepresidente del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun, Yun Jong Ho, presento informe de la ocasion.
					
					    El orador dijo que son insoportables e intolerables las desgracias y sufrimientos impuestos por la division nacional causada por las fuerzas extranjeras, y llamo a todos los coreanos a abrir el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente poniendo de pleno manifiesto el poderio nacional y la voluntad de reunificacion. 
					
					  Exhorto a unirse monoliticamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Sol de la nacion y redentor de la reunificacion de la patria, y luchar con dinamismo por la construccion de una potencia socialista y por la victoria final en la confrontacion antiyanqui.
